attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its reported that RBC say that they need to knock down the Hexagon, Civic Centre and Library as they are tired! The Hexagon is a great venue for concerts and it is the only place in reading that yung people can see good bands, as the Fez club and the Purple Turtle are usually over 16's or over 18's. This petition is to oppose the demolition of the Reading Hexagon.
